Text.Page:
This cursed affliction is affecting creatures around Scythera Fae. We must thin their numbers to keep the people safe.

Kill {@LinkCreature:54#270#rampant ghilliedhus}, {@LinkCreature:54#120#bloodhorn mugatos}, {@LinkCreature:54#150#gutripper sabertooths}, and {@LinkCreature:54#440#feral poporis}.

Report back to me when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
